name: KatanaGun!
description:
This game was made for the "LOWREZJAM 2021" in the span of two days, In the game, You play as a robot trying to slay as many drones as he can using his weapon, KatanaGun!

  • CONTROLS:
  •     WASD - Move
  •     Spacebar - jump
  •     Left Click - Shoot
  •     Right Click - Parry
  •     Shift - Dash

.
